name: Trail of the Damned
description:
In Trail of the Damned you explore the hellscape known as Damnation, solving mysteries, unlocking secrets, and surviving endless dangers on your quest for Salvation.

Branching Gameplay!


Uncover an unforgiving branching narrative, as you travel in an Oregon Trail style of gameplay, filled with unnerving encounters and unlikely companions. Hideous dangers lurk around every corner and your choices will determine who you are, where you go, what you do, who you meet, and ultimately how your story ends.

Encounter Disturbing Horrors!


The art style is very stark and full of contrast - meant to evoke the feelings of darkness and dread appropriate to such a world of horrors.

Solve Mysteries!


The game invites you to explore these horrors at your own pace. Along the way you'll find a land filled with mystery, possibility, and danger. Uncovering and solving certain mysteries will open new locations for exploration.

Features!

  • Seek Salvation, an escape from all that ails, with multiple endings and a variety of challenges along the way.
  • The choices you make determine who you are. Are you a con artist? A bully? A scavenger? How you navigate the perils Damnation is up to you.
  • Explore a unique fantasy hellscape inspired by creepy silent horror films and other unnerving works.
  • Solve puzzles and riddles to unlock mysterious hidden areas.
  • Your adventures are underscored by an eerie yet exciting string quartet OST inspired by and combining the kinds of instruments one might hear in a silent movie house.
